Overview

The Pig Documentation provides the information you need to get started using Pig.

Begin with the Pig Getting Started Guide which shows you how to download and run Pig. Then try out the Pig Tutorial to get an idea of how easy it us to use Pig. When you are ready to start writing your own scripts, read through the Pig Latin Manual to become familiar with Pig's features. Also review the Pig Cookbook to learn how to tweak your code for optimal performance.

If you have more questions, you can ask on the Pig Mailing Lists.
